alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Irwin; Turner (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 8:44AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Irwin, eastern Turner and Ben Hill Counties through 930 AM EDT... At 844 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Eastman to near Abbeville to near Arabi. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Ocilla, Mystic, Rebecca, Lulaville, Amboy, Osierfield, Waterloo, Pinetta, Ashton, Irwinville, Fitzgerald Municipal A/P, Irwinville Airport, Bowens Mill, Red Bluff, Arp, Abba and Queensland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
